Comment:
Hi everyone!

I feel I need to give myself a bit of a lift after losing a game to an Expert that I should have won, albeit I lost because I adopted the wrong plan in the endgame.  Many thanks to Coach Ion btw for annotating that game.  At least I can take some heart that I learned a lesson from GM Cyrano (annotated game here http://gameknot.com/annotation.pl/cyrano?gm=38055) about the value of connected passed central pawns.  In this game I did manage to get one of those pawns one square away from Glendadom before my opponent waved the white flag on the grounds of ruinous loss of material.  Gameknot analysis is provided here. http://gameknot.com/analyze-board.pl?bd=16118149&fb=1&rnd=0.00941152281071661
1. .... d5 - a double QP opening.
2. ..... c5 - a temporary pawn sac because if PxP then the pawn on c5 may be very difficult to retain.
2. ..... c5 - a temporary pawn sac because if PxP then the pawn on c5 may be very difficult to retain.
5. .... Glenda emerges and hits at the b2 pawn.
5. .... Glenda emerges and hits at the b2 pawn.
7. ...... Qxc3 - in the enemy camp, Glenda feasts away on another juicy p(r)awn.
7. ...... Qxc3 - in the enemy camp, Glenda feasts away on another juicy p(r)awn.
11. gxf3 - I decided to trade Fou Leblanc for white's knight because I am two pawns up and so I take advantage of the pin on the d2 knight to mess up white's pawn structure on the kingside.

12. ..... fxe5 - another pawn trade gives me a strong central pawn line up.

13. ...... Bd6 - I have badly neglected my kingside development - it is time to remedy that with Fou Lenoir coming out to support that pawn centre.
13. ...... Bd6 - I have badly neglected my kingside development - it is time to remedy that with Fou Lenoir coming out to support that pawn centre.
14. ..... Nge7 - white regains one of his pawns and I develop my king knight to clear the decks and to block off the WR's control on my second rank.

17. ..... Nxa5 - I retain my 1 pawn advantage and I have swapped off two sets of major pieces in the process in order to get a won endgame.

18. ......Kf7 - I do not mind this check as Henry clears the way for my rook to come to wherever he pleases on the first rank.  Henry is also better nearer the centre with the queens off so I do not mind foregoing castling rights here.
